attr.title: Demon Keep
attr.desc: Demon Keep is a minimalistic, classic roguelike with a dice rolling twist that is a kin to a mix between Porklike and Dicey Dungeons. The great Demon lord returns to his keep only to find that it has been overrun by a pack of bothersome goblins who are trying to steal from the keep's treasury.
attr.inst: Download the game https://youdoyoubuddy.itch.io/demon-keep and copy the exe or love file into the port folder.
